## WorldEventPayloads."WORLD.SET\_SKYBOX\_INTENSITY" property

Emitted when the intensity of the world's skybox brightness is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[WorldEvent.SET_SKYBOX_INTENSITY]: {
        world: World;
        intensity: number;
    };
```
